nodes.text: Zentine Dynamics was a starship manufacturer operational during the time of the Old Republic.

Zentine Dynamics were the manufacturers of the Ministry-class orbital shuttle, which was produced at the Foerost Shipyards in the years following the Great Sith War and used througout the galaxy in the decades following the conflict.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the company was targetted by a hacker hiding on Verroth who had stolen the prototype plans for a new shuttle.
